subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] A skeptic blog/article.
author: April Abercrombie
full_text:
------=_NextPart_000_0178_01C9C80B.B5ECCBC0
Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

These people and people like them don't matter. The ones that will be swaye=
d without looking into all the facts aren't your friends anyway. Getting in=
to petty arguments with these people just brings you down to their level. Y=
ou look far more credible if you don't even give them any heed. People who =
are worthy of your energy and really want to know the truth will look at bo=
th sides objectively. They will come to the source, as I have.

In the end,=
 it will only cause more problems for you if you engage these types.

Besid=
es that, who cares what ANYONE thinks? Who cares who sways who? Frank shoul=
d be doing this for himself first and foremost. He is not going to be able =
to prove his recordings scientifically, so why bother to compete? All he ne=
eds to do is prove them to himself.

It is a total different thing to try a=
nd debunk evidence to actually prove something. The skeptic debunks things =
so that he may be left with true proof.

That is not what these debunkers d=
o. These guys say everything is a debunked, without ever really testing.

Y=
ou are always willing to test new theories and technologies to really see t=
he truth of it yourself. This is why you are not a debunker. If you were a =
debunker, you wouldn't even try.

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: E=
ric VanDuzer 
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Tuesday, April 28, 200=
9 1:38 PM
  Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] A skeptic blog/article.





  Honestly =
Frank I say slap too.  I know that I am not very active in this group but I=
 do read everything.  To me that was a pure attack.  Yes they are debunkers=
 and they won't believe anything, but if you don't say anything and just ba=
ck down there is that one person out there that will be swayed they way of =
the skeptic and will not here our side.  Slap away and let us be heard and =
get our opinions and beliefs out there.  If it touches one person (Like me =
I used to be one of those "debunkers" then I heard the stuff that comes thr=
ough ITC and EVP research) it is worth the carpal tunnel.  And to add I am =
a investigator who still uses a debunking aspect toward the investigation, =
 but I am also a researcher and if there is something new out there I am al=
ways willing to test it and see what comes through. 



  On Tue, Apr 28, 2=
009 at 3:17 PM, Fransen, Debbie <debbie.fransen@...> wrote:





    =
YES, yes I do.........LMAO



---------------------------------------------=
-------------------------------

    From: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com [mailto:=
EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com] On Behalf Of April Abercrombie

    Sent: Tuesday,=
 April 28, 2009 2:56 PM

    To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
    Subject: Re: [=
EVP-ITC] A skeptic blog/article.




    You just want to watch LOL!

     =
 ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: Fransen, Debbie 
      To: EVP-I=
TC@yahoogroups.com 
      Sent: Tuesday, April 28, 2009 12:48 PM
      Subj=
ect: RE: [EVP-ITC] A skeptic blog/article.



      I say slap them Frank. =
Slap them hard. LOL



----------------------------------------------------=
----------------------
      From: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com [mailto:EVP-ITC@=
yahoogroups.com] On Behalf Of April Abercrombie
      Sent: Tuesday, April =
28, 2009 2:26 PM
      To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
      Subject: Re: [EVP-=
ITC] A skeptic blog/article.



      The problem with that Frank, is that =
it is a never ending battle and in the end, you can't win because nothing y=
ou do or say will change them. I just ends up causing you more grief.

    =
    ----- Original Message ----- 
        From: Frank Sumption 
        To:=
 EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
        Sent: Tuesday, April 28, 2009 12:23 PM
  =
      Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] A skeptic blog/article.



        Well, when =
these jerks slap me, I'm gonna slap back.

         F-S


        On Tue, A=
pr 28, 2009 at 9:58 AM, April Abercrombie <april@abercrombieghostresearch.c=
om> wrote:





          Not even worth wasting your carpal tunnel on that=
. The guy is a debunker, not a skeptic. It won't matter what evidence or ar=
gument you pose, he, and people like him will never believe it. They are ju=
st as bad as people who believe in everything blindly.

          A true sk=
eptic remains unbiased-either way, until such a time as something is proven=
 100% either way.

          April

            ----- Original Message ----=
- 
            From: Frank Sumption 
            To: evp-itc@...=
m ; grassharp@yahoogroups.com 
            Sent: Monday, April 27, 2009 7:1=
0 PM
            Subject: [EVP-ITC] A skeptic blog/article.



            =
http://skepticblog.org/2009/04/25/box-of-fiends/#more-2199

             Of=
 course, I had to comment.

             F-S
